trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Poison damage.

action.name: Nightmare Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 38 ({@damage 7d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the dragon's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

legendary.name: Pounce
entries: The dragon moves up to half its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB}, and it makes one Rend attack.

legendary.name: Spore Salvo
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature within 30 feet of the dragon that it can see. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.
